It’s Wipe Nothing Day

07 Mar 2011

The latest incarnation of wipes, called Boogie wipes, saline wipes that “dissolve boogers,” had me thinking about all of the various wipes we use and how they create meaningless landfill–all part of our “use and toss” culture of convenience.

So, I declare today Wipe Nothing Day. Of course you’ll need to wipe some things, but please, keep it to a necessary limit.

And for more on the implications of wipes + just how many we use check out this article that probes the issue even further.

About us

Hypenotic is a marketing strategy, design & development firm that chooses to use its powers for good. We’re a certified founding member of B Corp in Canada, and if you don’t know what that is, it’s time you do. Since ’98, we’ve helped a lot of interesting people do important things. We create relevant communications and useful experiences. Find out more.
